Translations.Text: Eteke yetiya duyo dale parasparaka dekhile, tetiya muchara sangisakale ka’le, ‘niscaya ami dharaa parailo!’
Mucha'i ka’le, ‘ketiya'o nahaya, mora lagata mora pratipalaka ache; anatipalame te'om moka pathanirdesa karaiba’
Tara pichata ami muchara prati ahi karailo ye, ‘tomara lakhutirae sagarata aghata karaa’. Phalata sagara bibhakta hai pratyeka bhaga bisala parbatara darae hai ga’la
arau ami ana dalatoko se'i tha'ira nikatararti karailo
arau ami ud'dhara karailo mucha arau te'omra sangisakala
tara pichata duba'i marailo anato dalaka
Niscaya iyara majata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i mumina nahaya
Arau niscaya tomara raba mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
Arau tumi sihamtara ocarata ibraahimara brttanta barnana karaa
Yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaa’
sihamte ka’le, ‘ami murti puja karao; eteke ami nisthara saite se'itoke dharai thakima’
Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke yetiya ahbana karaa tetiya se'iborae tomalokara ahbana suna payane
‘athaba sihamte tomalokara upakara na'iba ksati karaiba parae neki’
sihamte ka’le, ‘baram ami amara pitrpurausa sakalaka pa'icho, te'omloke enekuraa'i karaichila’
Ibraahime ka’le, ‘tomaloke bhabi ca'ichane, yisakalara ibadata tomaloke karaa
‘tomaloka arau tomalokara pitrpurausa sakala
‘ataye mora satrau kerala bisbajagatara raba (allaha)ra bahirae
‘Yijane moka srsti karaiche, tara pichata teraemi moka hidayata diche
‘Teraemi moka ahara karaaya arau teraemi moka pana karaaya
‘Arau yetiya ma'i asustha ha'om, tetiya teraemi moka araogya karae
‘Teraemi mora mrtyu ghataba arau teraemi moka punarjiraita karaiba
‘Arau te'omra ocarate'i mora asa ye, te'om moka kiyamatara dina mora aparaadhasamuha ksama karai diba
‘He mora raba! Moka hikamata dana karaa arau satkarmasilasakalara antarbhukta karaa
